content: > join the sweet bee crochet facebook > group you are welcome to share your > project photos links to your > favourite patterns and connect with > others in an encouraging and positive > environment click here to join 1 crochet a cute granny square drawstring pouch using your favourite worsted weight yarn perfect for a variety of uses this project is a great stash buster and with easily customizable colour options **materials needed ** * approximately 50 yards total of worsted weight yarn i used wecrochet heatherly in 3 colours sweet bing colour a snowflake colour b and sweetheart colour c * approximately 20 inches of ribbon * 5mm hook * yarn needle * scissors * measuring tape * stitch marker 1 https //www facebook com/groups/sweetbeecrochet
